## Course requirements

No prior knowledge of social network analysis is assumed for this
course. However, it would be useful to read *Doing social network
research* (Robins, 2015). SAGE Publications Ltd.*Â *

## Who is this course for?

Postgraduate research students, postdocs and academics wishing to use
Social Networks in their research.

## Recommended reading

Borgatti, S. P., Everett, M. G., Johnson, J. C. & Agneessens, F. (2022).
*Analyzing social networks using R*. Sage.

Rawling, C., Smith, J.A., Moody, J. & McFarland, D. (2023). *Network Analysis: Integrating Social Network Theory, Method, and Application with R*. Cambridge University Press.

Scott, J. (2017). *Social Network Analysis: A Handbook*. Sage.

## Language

Summer school courses will be taught in English unless all the
participants are proficient in Spanish.
